text.0: we stablish thee as manus used as manus used we kindle thee.
text.1: like manus for the pious man  aṅgiras agni worship gods.
text.2: for well o agni art thou pleased when thou art kindled mid mankind.
text.3: straight go the ladles unto thee thou highborn god whose food is oil.
text.4: thee have all gods of one accord established as their messenger.
text.5: serving at sacrifices men adore thee as a god o sage.
text.6: let mortal man adore your god agni with worship due to gods.
text.7: shine forth enkindled radiant one sit in the chamber of the law sit in the chamber of the food.
